webApi.name: Scaled Process Throughput: All Processes
webApi.a:expression:
with( local!pageSizeParam: tointeger(index(http!request.queryParameters, "pageSize")), local!pageSize: if( isnull(local!pageSizeParam), 25, local!pageSizeParam ), local!startIndexParam: tointeger(index(http!request.queryParameters, "page")), local!startIndex: if( isnull(local!startIndexParam), 1, local!startIndexParam*local!pageSize ), local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: local!startIndex, batchSize: local!pageSize),
local!report: a!queryProcessAnalytics( report: #"_a-0000e051-c1fa-8000-6110-01ef9001ef90_5581", query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"(pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_httpResponse"( headers: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_httpHeader"(name: "content-type", value: "application/json") }, body: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson"(value: local!report) ) )
